com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa

Class ExecutionServiceJPAImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.services.impl.jpa.ExecutionServiceJPAImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionService

    @Named
public class ExecutionServiceJPAImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExecutionService
    Implementation of the Genie Execution Service API that uses a local job launcher (via the job manager implementation), and uses OpenJPA for persistence.

    • Constructor Summary

      Default constructor - initializes persistence manager, and other utility classes.

                                       JobService jobService)
        Default constructor - initializes persistence manager, and other utility classes.
        Parameters:
        jobRepo - The job repository to use.
        stats - the GenieNodeStatistics object
        jobCountManager - the job count manager to use
        jobManagerFactory - The the job manager factory to use
        jobService - The job service to use.
